home.features.title: More Features.
home.features.feat_1.title: Lightning Fast
home.features.feat_1.desc: More than 1,000,000 TPS capacity with a final confirmation time of under 1 sec.
home.features.feat_2.title: No Transaction Fees
home.features.feat_2.desc: Zero fee transactions, competency in micropayment and everyday payment scenarios.
home.features.feat_3.title: Popular dApps
home.features.feat_3.desc: Over 1000+ popular dApps running on Mixin Network.
home.features.feat_4.title: Developer Friendly
home.features.feat_4.desc: Make it easier for developers to use any language they want to quickly create products and services.
